meanings.definition: A small seabird of the auk family, typically found in northern oceans.
meanings.sent1: The murrelets glided gracefully over the ocean waves.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of murrelets diving for fish near the shore.
meanings.sent3: The murrelets decided to have a race to see who could catch the most fish.
meanings.sent4: The murrelets' synchronized flight resembled a ballet in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The colorful murrelets added a vibrant touch to the dull ocean scenery.

meanings.sent1: We saw a flock of murrelets flying in the distance.
meanings.sent2: The murrelets nested together on the rocky cliffs.
meanings.sent3: The murrelets held a meeting to discuss their upcoming migration.
meanings.sent4: The murrelets' calls filled the air with a chorus of chirps.
meanings.sent5: The playful murrelets darted in and out of the water, enjoying the sunny day.
